Name: Memory Player
About the game: A memory training game that let you memorize the order of one shuffled deck of 52 playing cards in minutes. Memorize a deck of cards is a classic event of World Memory Championships. Turn a gamer to a Master of Memory. Features Customize card, include graph and words. You can use any image as poker face. Shuffle deck. View cards, and make a story with scene, character, spell and equipment. Examine. Suit Definition ♥ Character ♣ Scene ♦ Spell ♠ Equipment
